Scenario: Neighborhood social cohesion work valued as care contribution
    Given Frank builds relationships across the neighborhood
    And he organizes informal gatherings and supports connections
    And social cohesion is essential neighborhood infrastructure
    When the neighborhood_elohim tracks relationship-building work
    Then Frank's social cohesion labor should be recognized
    And organizing gatherings, welcoming newcomers, maintaining connections should be valued
    And the invisible work of community-building should be quantified
    And Frank should experience his relationship work as valuable contribution
    And neighborhood resilience should be understood as built through care labor
    And his decades of relationship investment should be visible
